attributes.action: Allow the people to recall any politician working against the Brexit process.
attributes.additional_details: Britain is the mother of democracy all around the world and in this respect must be seen to be above reproach.  I other countries and businesses are going to have confidence in trading with Britain the Brexit process must be seen to be stable, efficient and effective.  The last thing our country needs is overt or covert infighting within parliament by the disgruntled Stay In advocates that lost the referendum.  It is now time for all politicians of all parties to unite behind a pain free Brexit.
attributes.background: The people have decided on Brxit in a democratic referendum.  All politicians must accept the will of the people and not do anything to frustrate the Brexit process.  If the do betray and covertly work against the democratic process in parliament, then the people must be able to recall and sack them

rejection.details:
You could start a petition calling for a specific change to the Recall of MPs Act 2015. 
For example, you could ask for the Act to be changed to allow constituents to petition for the recall of their MP if they don't agree with his or her views and opinions.
